ModMetaData.name: AdvancedGeneProcessor单格先进基因处理器
ModMetaData.author: 幽月琉璃Luna
ModMetaData.description:
先进基因处理器mod，添加了一种占地仅单格、复杂度提升更大的高级机械超频仪，需要极致机械族科技解锁 [*]Added an advanced gene processor on a 1×1 cell. [*]The advanced mech booster has genetic complexity increase of 3 (2 in the original) and needs to be unlocked by researching UltraMechtech. [*]If you have Save Our Ship 2 installed, the machine will consume Exotic Particles to build, but the genetic complexity increase becomes 6.
如果你同时安装了[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1909914131] SOS2 [/url]、[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2380740/RimWorld__Anomaly] Anomaly [/url]或者[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3370644015] MeatCore 血肉重铸 Bio-Anomaly Flesh Reforged [/url]，你还会得到与之联动的更强大的基因处理器。
If you also have [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1909914131] SOS2 [/url]、[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2380740/RimWorld__Anomaly] Anomaly [/url]or[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3370644015] MeatCore 血肉重铸 Bio-Anomaly Flesh Reforged [/url] installed, you'll also get a more powerful gene processor that works with them.
